title: How to build vs a Devourer build jungler?
body:
Was just wondering how you build vs a Devourer build jungler. As I just vs a yi and I was unable to solo him as rammus and I had {{item:1401}}  and {{item:3075}}  and he melted me with 3 items {{item:1415}}  {{item:3153}}  {{item:3047}}.
And how is it fair that the Devourer build is so cheap. Or is it just makes it easier to kill and farm.

replies.body:
Devourer junglers aren't so much about building to counter them, as to delay their sated for as long as possible. 

To do this, there are a few of things you could do (especially in ranked where you can see their pick).

*  Counter jungle the ♥♥♥♥ out of them. They need their stacks in order to become stated and incredibly strong. If you are continuously counter jungling them and keeping control of objectives, they can't do this. Keep wards deep in their jungle (**trackers knife** is perfect for this) and get your  friendly laners to help you. 
*  If the jungler you are playing isn't going to be the best at counter jungling, focus on fast pacing the game and snowballing your lanes. Apply that map pressure, get your laners fed. Progress the game to a stage where the enemy jungler either needs to match your map pressure (taking them away from their precious farming), or loses control of their jungle due to your superior vision.
* If you have failed the above options and they have managed to become sated (or very close to), you must work hard to counter their strengths. Devourer junglers rely heavily on their attack speed. What are you going to do? Buy **randuins** and **frozen heart**.  Both these items lower attack speed and  come with some A+ armour which will also go a long way in fighting them.

A lot of devourer junglers are currently building **guinsoos**, so keep this in mind while fighting them: You must play around the stacks they have. Kite them for a lil while so the stacks can fall off, then go in for a _balls-to-the-wall engage_ (keeping in mind that you have a short timeframe before you have to back off due to them regaining stacks). **Frozen heart** is also a pretty good counter to **guinsoos** as well. 
Another way of dealing with this item (works best in ranked where you can see champs and guess build paths) is to pick an annoying tank with strong AR and MR, who wont be shredded by the damage easily (think: malphite, mundo).

If all else fails {{champion:20}} ♥

Also try not to solo them, you must defeat the evil as a team.
so you admit that sated needs to be removed lol
Where in that post does it say Sated needs to be removed?

Also try not to solo them
there lol I believe if no champ can solo yi wen he at full build that's overpowered
It's not so much that,  just that you need teammates to chain cc him and provide continuous damage. Same with any carry with good mobility.

so if a yi can go {{item:3931}} {{item:3124}} then tank and kill take out your adc mid jg who ever has low hp and take next to no damage cos he went tank you think that's ok and balanced and I mean low hp as in 100% is 2k hp
Do you ever not write a novel as a reply XD

the only way iv seen to beat a late game yi is to burst him cc the hell out of him but most yi are going{{item:3931}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3068}} with 1 last tank or ad item so good buy burst

Really thought this thread would get more attention.
But hey thanks for the advise.
kill scuttles, and that yi with bork is a recipe to delete tanks...
